label: dog
caption: The brown and black puppy, its fur fluffed up from excitement, stands on its hind legs by a camera lens, its curious eyes gazing up at the photographer as it tries to get a better look at itself in the reflected light. The puppy's tail wags enthusiastically, thumping against the photographer's leg as they wait for the perfect shot. In the background, a blurred room with wooden furniture can be seen through the camera lens.
